title: Baltasar
description: Public Affairs and Strategic Communication Consulting

approach.title: Approach
approach.description:
Baltasar is a public affairs and strategic communication consulting firm founded in 2023 by Alexis Abeille and Geoffroy Daignes.
We have in-depth knowledge of our clients' industries — healthcare, tech, industry, commerce, vocational training, transportation, energy — and leverage our expertise to help them achieve their ambitions.
We offer methodical and precise support: we assist our clients in building their strategic roadmap and then oversee its operational execution by producing the right content or ensuring the proper connections are made.
We excel in teamwork and are surrounded by a network of high-level partners — journalists, researchers, lawyers, designers, e-influence experts — to consistently provide solutions.
We place particular importance on writing and clarifying our clients' technical challenges and complex messages, as we believe this is at the core of a successful consulting service.

alexis.name: Alexis Abeille
alexis.description:
Alexis Abeille has nearly 10 years of experience supporting companies, foundations, federations, and executives.
Having worked for major communication groups, he also served as part of the management team of the Pierre Deniker Foundation, located at Sainte-Anne Hospital in Paris, which supports psychiatric research and raises public awareness of mental health issues.
Committed to informing young people about mental health issues, he is also an avid reader of novels and occasionally contributes to public debates with Geoffroy Daignes (notably for the journal Le Débat).
He is a graduate of Sciences Po Paris (2012) and ESCP Europe (2015).

geoffroy.name: Geoffroy Daignes
geoffroy.description:
Geoffroy Daignes has been advising large companies, federations, startups, associations, and their leaders for over 10 years.
He began his career by developing a startup in the education and vocational training sector for three years. He then worked for major communication groups (Publicis / Havas) and in specialized public affairs firms (Batout Guilbaud / Pergamon).
Throughout his career, he has specialized in the healthcare, digital, education, and energy sectors.
He contributes to public debates through publications in journals (Le Débat - Gallimard) and the press (Le Monde, Le Figaro, Libération…).
